description: Brant showed off her baby bump in a black bikini during a fun-filled day of paddle boarding this week
title: Lauren Brant shows off her baby bump as she paddle boards
title_page: Lauren Brant shows off her baby bump as she paddle boards | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's currently pregnant with her first child.
And this week, Lauren Brant showed off her baby bump in a black bikini during a fun-filled day of paddle boarding.
The 27-year-old former Hi-5 star beamed as she paddled away in a short video that was shared to Instagram.
Scroll down for video
Baby on board! Lauren Brant showed off her baby bump in a black bikini during a fun-filled day of paddle boarding this week
Lauren's fun day out comes one month after she recreated Beyoncé's iconic Instagram pregnancy photo.
She took to Instagram to share her version of the singer's viral image, as she and partner Barry Hall await the birth of their first child.
Wearing a black bra with matching underwear, Lauren sat below an arrangement of flowers with a floral crown on her head.
She's glowing! Lauren is expecting her first child with former AFL player Barry Hall
Staring at the camera, she held her hands around her pregnant belly in a similar fashion to Beyoncé.
But while her pose was identical, it lacked the flower arrangement - and 10.3 million likes - that the Lemonade singer enjoyed.
'Hens Party + Bridesmaids + Left Over Flowers + Pregnant Lady = Girls who love a good time and a good laugh doing their version of our Queen - BEYONCÉ,' Lauren captioned her photo.
That's familiar! Former Hi-5 performer Lauren copied Beyoncé's viral pregnancy photo
Viral: The Lemonade singer's photo was the most 'liked' Instagram photo ever
The former children's entertainer, who is a fan of the Destiny's Child superstar, is expecting her first child in May.
Barry and Lauren first met on set of I'm A Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here! in 2015 but did not begin dating until months later.
Last month, Lauren threw a gorgeous baby shower in Melbourne.
